Capabilities.Title: Features
Capabilities.Line6: Apply for the connection of the deposits of Bank products
Capabilities.Line8: Control access for employees, connected to the system

Functionality.Title: B.One platform functionality
Functionality.Line2: Access to the deposits, making replenishment (web and mobile app)
Functionality.Line3: Access to the loans, making repayment (web and mobile app)
Functionality.Line4: Branches and ATM map. Making routes to the nearest branch/ATM. Import points via XML file or from Core system. Online currency rates (from Core system).
Functionality.Line5: An authorized user can create an restricted access  "user". Amount of "users" has no limitation.
Functionality.Line6: Make an application for deposit, credit, bank guarantee or any other bank product
Functionality.Line8: The user has the ability to change and recover the password. Use EDS-token or SMS OTP Authentication. For mobile applications - use FaceID, TouchID. The Admin Console has flexible user lock settings

Online banking products and services con: Online system of managing Bank accounts and products
Expect the latest development in April 2: Expect the latest development in April 2019
